channel.title: Linux Mint
channel.description:
Well, yesterday I was trying to connect my Uncle's PS3 controller to my PC. I used a program (which several youtubers recommended) and it overwrote every driver I had installed. I tried using the Asus recovery partition, but after clearing the OS partition of all its contents it threw an Error. Now that partition wont fully boot up either.
tl;dr - I have to install Linux Mint9 since it was the only working CD of linux that I currently have. Does anybody have any experience with Minecraft under this? I arleady know Skyrim and such are lost for me :'(
EDIT: I will be downloading Ubuntu asap now that my computer is operable. Mint9 has no drivers for my computer so Minecraft ran at about 2-3FPS max lol.
